website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II camera is more responsive than its predecessor, and squeezes a big 1-inch sensor into a compact frame.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera and worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: Great camera! I was a bit apprehensive about having a touch screen camera but this is exceptional. The firmware has actually been made specifically for the camera and with 'ease of use' for the user in mind. Nice and compact and excellent photos!
customer_reviews.author: Nico of Sparta

customer_reviews.title: Little Gem.
customer_reviews.text: This is a fab little camera don't be fooled by the size it is as good as the big cameras . The sharpness of the photos ranks amongst the best ,they are simply brilliant from a little gem like this. It fits easly in your pocket I took it on holiday with me this year in lanzorate & left my big canon at home. Didn't have to worry about fitting it in my case. I fully recomend this little beauty .
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Bennett

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased overall. Very simple to use but with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased overall. Very simple to use but with a good many options if you want to do more than point and shoot. The viewing screen is good in bright sunlight unlike a similar Sony camera I purchased and had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Pilot

customer_reviews.title: A trusted `Which? best buy`at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with every aspect and feature of this great little camera. Purchased through a Which? magazine best buy recommendation, and so it proved to be. A little concern regarding promised delivery date, however, arrived in good time and well packed.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Barrie Davies

customer_reviews.title: Canon Powershot G9 X  MarkII
customer_reviews.text: I am a complete novice and until now my photos have been (quite frankly) rubbish. This camera has changed that, I especially wanted to photograph a nearby family of foxes. I now have some stunning pictures and videos .The camera is light, stylish and easy to use - I take it everywhere. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: florence howard

customer_reviews.title: Unable to connect to Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Arrived yesterday and is smaller than expected, but it's not a complaint. It seems easy to use. I've still got to have a play with all aspects of it. I'm loving the touch screen aspect of it. My only problem is that I cannot get it to connect to my phones Bluetooth and that is really disappointing because I specifically wanted Bluetooth. I've given it a lower number of stars because of that. It's extremely easy to connect to the WiFi and NFC though. On the whole its a lovely camera.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly Mixture

customer_reviews.title: There are better out there
customer_reviews.text: I watched some you tube videos recommending this camera,but I found it useless. In my old Sony camera you had a simple "trash"button where you could put unwanted photos to the bin,in this one you have to press 4times different messages before you are ready to delete anything :(Picture is not the best either,there is no option to force the lamp (either automatic or no lamp)quite disappointed really. Photos quality not bad but that's all
customer_reviews.author: K. Noskowicz

customer_reviews.title: Great all round pocket camera!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is TINY but packs a real punch for the size and cost. Easy to use (personally dislike touch screens but that’s apparently because I’m old). Super definition with great speed range which is useful because I take a lot of pictures of the dog racing about. If you are going to use the zoom on this, make sure you have a steady hand! I prefer not to use it and then edit up - with the pixel count, that’s simple and you can get great close-ups without losing definition.
customer_reviews.author: Liz-Stortford

customer_reviews.title: How to make it work
customer_reviews.text: This is obviously a very fine piece of photo equipment, but canon should understand we dont all have a degree in using a camera, my main gripe if you want a manual its approx 250 pages (a4) of which 90% is a mystery, there must be a beginners guide to a piece of equipment of this complexity Its great its a good looking and superb piece of equipment I justm wish I could understand it better
customer_reviews.author: D.J.Lake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: Bought as I wanted a small camera but one that takes good photos. This has not disappointed. Like the wifi connection also which makes it very easy to transfer photos to a mobile phone or tablet. Lots of other features which are quite neat if you like to adjust your photo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: I am still getting used to the touch screen. That is more about me than the camera. This is a direct replacement for a 10 year old Powershot.
customer_reviews.author: M Nixon

customer_reviews.title: Catch which holds the battery in is broken!
customer_reviews.text: Used item so I should not have been surprised to find that the catch which holds the battery in is broken! Have not used it yet as only arrived yesterday but have had similar camera before and loved it.
customer_reviews.author: CHUNKY

customer_reviews.title: Nice close-ups!
customer_reviews.text: Takes really nice close ups! Haven’t tested it to it full capability yet, but very easy to use! I’m very much a beginner. These photos are not edited either.
customer_reviews.author: Kayleigh

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with image quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good image quality considering the size of the camera, considering selling my main camera and just using this
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: excellent little camera!
customer_reviews.text: excellent little camera!. purchased mainly for bigger sensor and touch screen of which are both great.
customer_reviews.author: P. D. HOLMES

customer_reviews.title: Delighted
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant little camera - perfect to carry in your pocket - very easy to use too.
customer_reviews.author: JPD

customer_reviews.title: Why no manual?
customer_reviews.text: I had some difficulty programing it and then bought a manual. It's ridiculous to buy electronic equipment with no manual provided. That is my main complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Juliet W

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: It is a good camera if you Re looking for something better than your phone and smaller than a professional camera. You can keep it in your pocket. The quality of pictures are good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: compact and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: ideal lightweight camera for taking on walks/holidays. superb photo quality
customer_reviews.author: JayeL

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The mic is so muffled like you can barely get any audio when you’re recording
customer_reviews.author: Fareedah Martins

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera, Lousy App
customer_reviews.text: A great little premium camera and much cheaper than the Sony, if a tad less capable. As I already own a G15 and an old ixus it is a familiar system. It can be a bit difficult with larger hands but is so so portable. The only downside is that, despite having NFC, WiFi and Bluetooth, they need a Canon app to function, and I am not alone in simply being unable to get them to work. It's back to card readers and a wire, which is a shame really and let's an otherwise polished product down.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: Brought this camera after a lot of searching and comparing with similar models (Sony RX100). My main requirement was for low light indoor party photography. I have used it twice in very dark conditions with difficult lighting (on a boat party and a wedding reception) and it did not disappoint. In fact the picture quality and detail were absolutely superb. This camera is beautifully compact and very sturdy which is ideal if you do not want to lug around a great big SLR but you still want outstanding pictures.
customer_reviews.author: MRS D A COUSINS

customer_reviews.title: Lens cover rubbish and hates the damp alot
customer_reviews.text: Great camera but hates the slightest bit of damp. Good in low light. Be easy to brake. Lens cover jams and this after less than month of use
customer_reviews.author: 4seasonbackpacking

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the image quality and ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: Superb in low-light environments. Image quality as good as high end SLR cameras
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Stephen G. Dale

customer_reviews.title: A Good Small Camera
customer_reviews.text: Very handy for pockets and takes excellent pictures. A bit complex though.
customer_reviews.author: Rats Chandler

customer_reviews.title: Why no instruction manual?
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars if it came with an instruction manual. It is very easy to use and takes great pictures
customer_reviews.author: Stanley Gee

customer_reviews.title: Rubbish Camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera is rubbish. I have purchased two of these cameras and both times the lens became frozen. Both times about 2 to 3 months outside the guarantee period. Canon would not fix without a fixed fee of approximately £180.00 before additional charges over and above the fixed fee. I will never buy another Canon product. I have now two ornaments on my book case which no more use than a white elephant
customer_reviews.author: Brian Livesey

product_meta.title: Canon Powershot G9 X Mark II Digital Camera Camera - Black
product_meta.description:
Size Name:Camera| Colour:BlackExpert quality in a connected camera that’s ideal as a smartphone companion. A 1.0 type sensor, bright f/2.0-4.9 lens and superior DIGIC 7 ensure DSLR-like creativity with as much or as little control as you like.

BOX CONTAINS
Wrist Strap, Battery Pack NB-13L, Battery Charger CB-2LHE, AC Cable, User Manual Kit
feature_bullets: Pocketable ideal image quality in any light
Take beautifully simple control. Shutter speed: 1-1/2000 s (Auto Mode). 1/8 - 1/2000 s (Movie Mode). Bulb: 30 - 1/2000 s (total range – varies by shooting mode)
Easily capture superb, shareable full HD movies
Designed for effortless creativity. Storage media: SD/SDHC/SDXC and UHS-I memory cards
Wrist strap, battery pack NB-13 L, battery charger CB-2LHE, AC cable, user manual kit
Closest Focusing Distance is 5 centimeter (Wide) from front of lens and 35 centimeter (Tele) from front of lens

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
